pageContext.claim: “If you look since the election, we've gone up -- the Dow went up close to 45 percent. The S&P 500 went up 47 percent, and NASDAQ composite went up -- getting close to 100 percent. So these are numbers that are not numbers that other presidents would have. And they won't have it. The only thing they can kill it is a bad president or a president that wants to raise taxes.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump gives himself far too much credit for stock market success. Even with the recent gains, investors did better under Obama in the same time period, so it's simply wrong to say another president could not match his record.
